game.name: Mech Battle Simulator
game.description:
There is a time when the Mech wars of the year 3070 have reached to the last marathon combat. You have a cool unit of killer robots that are ready to fight against anyone. It does not make sense to wait anymore. Why do not you join Mech Battle Simulator right away to guide your robots to fight against a huge horde of dangerous enemies? Do not bother at all as you are surrounded by plenty of warrior robots, robot spiders and dessert buggy units.

Take your position on the amazing fighting weapon, fight like a champion and get ready to explore the awesome 3D battlefield environment! Your successful efforts will help to reward you with some money. Make sure to use it wisely and prepare the fabulous combination to eliminate them all in this cool robot war strategy game. Choose from any option from multiple types of mechs and get ready to send many smaller ones initially!

You can also go for the big and powerful mechs or several options out of each kind to destroy the combination of your enemy mechs. It takes a proper planning and a nice strategy to pass all levels in this one of the best online battle simulator games for boys. Check out the instructions wisely to complete each level successfully! You would have multiple levels to play through and finish. Good luck to complete all these missions to shine like a true fighter in this cool HTML5 war game! Relax your mind while browsing through our extensive collection of free adventure games for boys!
